meanings.definition: The sale of goods or tickets before they are officially available to the general public.
meanings.sent1: I bought tickets during the presale for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The presale for the new video game sold out quickly.
meanings.sent3: During the presale, I felt like a VIP getting early access to the products.
meanings.sent4: The presale felt like a secret club where only a few lucky people could enter.
meanings.sent5: The presale experience was exclusive and exciting, like a sneak peek behind the scenes.

meanings.definition: The act of selling something before it is officially released or made available to the public.
meanings.sent1: The presale of the limited edition sneakers was a huge success.
meanings.sent2: Art collectors eagerly awaited the presale of the rare paintings.
meanings.sent3: The presale of the new phone felt like a special treat before the official launch.
meanings.sent4: Being part of the presale made me feel like an insider in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The presale strategy helped create buzz and anticipation for the product release.
